description: To check the regression modeling of resources

panels.description: Range of the samples in the regression
panels.title: Variance $resource $container

panels.description: Number of samples in the regression
panels.title: N $resource $container

panels.description: Number of samples in the regression
panels.title: formula $resource $container

targets.expr: max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="offset", container=~"$container", resource="cpu"}) + max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_0",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_0",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) + (max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_1",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_1",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) OR vector(0)) + (max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_2",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_2",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) OR vector(0))+ (max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_3",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_3",container=~"$container",resource="cpu"}) OR vector(0))

max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="offset", container=~"$container", resource="mem"}) + max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_0",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_0",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) + (max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_1",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_1",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) OR vector(0)) + (max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_2",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_2",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) OR vector(0))+ (max(res_model_regression_coeff{coeff_name="predictor_3",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) * max(res_model_predictor_usage{coeff_name="predictor_3",container=~"$container",resource="mem"}) OR vector(0))

title: Resource Model Exporter2
